de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.io.manager

Class AFileManager<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.io.manager.AFileManager<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventManager, IFileManager<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigurationManager, FeatureModelManager

    public abstract class AFileManager<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFileManager<T>, IEventManager
    Responsible to load and save all information from / to a file.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter

                                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a path for a given file to store additional information.
        Parameters:
        path - The path pointing to the file.
        format - The format for the extra information file.
        Returns:
        The path to the extra information file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If path is empty.

      • read

        public boolean read()
        Description copied from interface: IFileManager
        Loads the content from the local file and stores it in the local object. To update the persistent and variable object, IFileManager.override() must be called.
        Specified by:
        read in interface IFileManager<T>
        Returns:
        true if successful read, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        IFileManager.override()
